channel.title: [PI] Animations Interrupted
channel.description: When performing a special attack, ANY special attack, during the animation if you click, it will stop the animation but the gfx will still continue. Like this: [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/scyzqf/5]Animation[/URL] Is there a way to make it so that the animation doesn't get interrupted by clicking?

item.title: [PI] Animations Interrupted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“DerpaDerpy, post:7, topic:528625”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=647379.msg4353893#msg4353893 date=1377132179]
The one in combatassistant.java is probably the one you’re looking for.
[/quote]It was in walking.java. Thanks for the help! I’ve been looking for a solution forever :D[/quote]
Of course! glad you fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Animations Interrupted
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:528625”][quote author=DerpaDerpy link=topic=647379.msg4353886#msg4353886 date=1377131809]

Search for something similar to: startAnimation(-1);
or startAnimation(65
I forget the last part of the second one, but there’s some anim ID in the 65000’s and it’s used to reset your player stance.
[/quote]Any particular file? I search “startAnimation(65” and it’s in about 13 files

What files?
They may be relevant to what you’re trying to do.[/quote]Combatassistant.java, Playerassistant.java, Walking.java, Npchandler.java, Actionhandler.java, Clickingitem.java, Clickingbuttons.java
I left out all the irrelevant files like skills cause the fix is obviously not in the skill files lol

Read full topic
